titleStmt.title: Bella Scot-Anglica. A brief of all the battells, and martiall encounters which have happened 'twixt England and Scotland, from all times to the present. VVherunto is annexed a corollary, declaring the causes whereby the Scot is come of late years to be so heightned in his spirits; with some prophecies which are much cryed up, as reflecting upon the fate of both nations.
titleStmt.author: Howell, James, 1594?-1666.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
